and its spatial periodic variation. Since the considered materials PSLC and PDLC have morphological
features, their interaction with the recording ﬁeld will be described in di
is determined fromthe solution of the free energy balance equation. In this
case the spatial distribution of electric ﬁeld of the recording optical wave should be taken into account.
